column5: Decided to brave the whiteout conditions and hit Simcoe today with a buddy.  If anyone plans on going out there, don't even think about it if you don't have a 4x4.  I hit a old pressure crack that had a good 4ft snow drift built up against it and it completely enveloped the truck    I was in 4wd the entire time out there with brand new snow tires and it was a tough go.  Hit a couple places, popped a fish here and there then finally found the active fish...    I got the big one about 30ft off the bottom, just chased it forever...
thanks for the report....lots of people are going to have fun with the conditions on simcoe this weekend !!  Love my sled

Well done and thx for the report on the conditions...I hope to get out this weekend.  Just starting playing with a Vex this winter. Man it's fun watching them come up like that and then feeling the thump
Good outing.  Are you bleeding your fish?
nope i would say its just a really firm hookset...   nice shootin
nice stuff Bill!!!  That's a big whitie!!!
Great stuff Bill...  ..those whities always seem to bleed Connie.
Good going Bill Nice whities Thanks for sharing Jacques
Way to go Bill!!!  Heading up to Simcoe next week, hopefully get into a few of those and a laker or two.
Nice report! I'll be out sat and sunday
